definition: the role of the head of a government department
details:
noun
- the role of the head of a government department
= example: the role of the head of a government department
- a large, flat, thin case for carrying loose papers or drawings or maps
- a list of the financial assets held by an individual or a bank or other financial institution
= example: a list of the financial assets held by an individual or a bank or other financial institution
- a set of pieces of creative work collected to be shown to potential customers or employers
= example: a set of pieces of creative work collected to be shown to potential customers or employers
